content.html: It is surreal to be catching up on LinkedIn and learn that a past co-worker's kids experienced a lockdown related to another school shooting last week that I didn't even know about. .. Y'all. Is this just happening every day/week and folks are just immune to it?
content.value:
It is surreal to be catching up on LinkedIn and learn that a past co-worker's kids experienced a lockdown related to another school shooting last week that I didn't even know about. 

.. Y'all. 

Is this just happening every day/week and folks are just immune to it?
